name: Final Game (nppham)
description:
Card Dungeon Made by Ernani Raffo, Grant Bosworth, John Lynch, and Nelson Pham. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In Card Dungeon, the player faces enemies which must be taken down using abilities determined on three possible cards. Their abilities are used upon clicking on them.

Other missing cards become available when using them, and while the player progresses through different levels, new cards will become available as well. Some cards can affect the status of the player seen on the left. When using a strength card for example, a strength attribute will show next to the player and will impact the damage done to the enemy.

Above the slime enemy's head is a blocking move, indicating that the enemy will block your attack and heal on the next turn rather than attack. As you progress through the game, your attributes are kept. Below is an image of the player reaching the Tainted Moor after defeating the slime enemy.

Good luck on your card collecting journey!
